mapper.insert: insert into good_logs(goods_code, num, time, user_code) values(#{goods_code},#{num},#{time},#{user_code})
mapper.select: select g.code "gcode", g.name "gname", g.num "gnum", g.id "gid", l.id "id", l.goods_code "goods_code", l.num "num", l.status "status", l.user_code "user_code", l.time "time" from goods g, good_logs l where l.goods_code = g.code and l.status_del = 1
